definition: (TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Methods:360 plums he spirit the sufferer presses Chinese medicine dialectics the cent type proceed treatment.
sentences.chinese: 方法将360例梅核气患者按中医辨证分型进行治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of globus hystericus treated by acupuncture and medicine.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察针药结合治疗“梅核气”的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective:Observe dialectics cent the type cures the clinical curative effect of the plum he spirit.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察辨证分型治疗梅核气的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Dialectics cent type treatment plum he spirit contain good and clinical curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论辨证分型治疗梅核气有良好的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between Meiheqi and chronic gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨梅核气与慢性胃炎的关系。

definition: illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
